OrgName.entry: PERMANENT WAY INSTITUTION, SHEFFIELD AND DONCASTER

Desc.entry: Aims to advance the knowledge of railway civil engineering with particular reference to track and infrastructure. Promotes the spread and exchange of information amongst those who work for railways and rail systems worldwide. Arranges national 2/3 Technical Track Engineering seminars and technical visits in the UK and abroad.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Please contact for details of meetings or see website
